scenes.title: The Unexpected Offer
scenes.description: A child is approached by an unfamiliar adult offering candy. Scene about: stringstri...
scenes.dialogue: Would you like some candy, little one?
scenes.learning_point: Be cautious with strangers offering gifts

scenes.title: Recognizing the Feeling
scenes.description: The child feels uncomfortable and confused about the situation
scenes.learning_point: Trust your gut feelings about people

scenes.title: Taking Action
scenes.description: The child moves away and looks for a safe adult
scenes.dialogue: I need to find my mom/dad
scenes.learning_point: Move to safety and find a trusted adult

scenes.title: Finding Safety
scenes.description: The child reaches a trusted adult and feels secure
scenes.dialogue: I found my parent, I'm safe now

scenes.title: Talking It Out
scenes.description: The parent listens without judgment and explains about stranger danger
scenes.dialogue: You did the right thing by coming to me
scenes.learning_point: Communication and education prevent future issues

scenes.title: Feeling Confident
scenes.description: The child now feels empowered with knowledge about personal safety
scenes.dialogue: Now I know how to stay safe!
